short_summary: moving services for various Federal Government Departments in the Province of Alberta
description: This amendment is to disregard the closing time and all bids must be submitted by March 14, 2024 at 14:00 EDT. The proposed Standing Offer is for the supply of all labour, material, equipment and supervision necessary to perform moving services for various Federal Government Departments in the Province of Alberta as detailed in the call-up as required during the period of the standing offer. The proposed Standing Offer is from award contract to March 31, 2027.
tags: Relocation services, Standing Offer, Request for Standing Offer, Competitive
full_summary:
**ET959-240883 - Standing Offer - Moving Services**
=====================================================

**Reference Number :** WS4450216360-Doc4452531589
---------------------------------------

* **Tender Status** : Expiré
* **Publication Date** : 2024-02-21
* **Tender Closing Date** : 2024-03-14T14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date** : 2024-03-29
* **Expected Contract End Date** : 2027-03-31

**Notice of Amendment**
-----------------
* **Amendment Number**: 2
* **Amendment Date** : 2024-03-04

**RFP Information**
------------------

* **RFP Category**: Services de déménagement
* **Notice Type**: Demande d’offre à commandes
* **Procurement Method**: Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner

**Subject Matter**
---------------

The solicitation seeks proposals from qualified vendors to provide relocation services to various Federal Government departments in Alberta.

**Supplier Information**
-------------------

* **End User Entity Name**: Ministère des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux (SPAC)
* **End User Entity Address**: 11, rue Laurier, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Québec, K1A 0S5, Canada
* **Contact Information**: Schultz, Kristen, kristen.schultz@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Bid Submission Information**
-----------------------------

The bid submission deadline is March 14, 2024 at 14:00 EDT. Please submit all required supporting documentation and bid submissions to the address provided.

**Selection Criteria**
-------------------

The selection criteria will be based on variations or combinations of the above methods.

**Trade Agreements**
-----------------

This request is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Accord de libre-échange Canada-Corée
* Accord de libre-échange nord-américain (ALENA)
* Accord de libre-échange Canada-Chili (ALECC)
* Accord de libre-échange Canada-Royaume-Uni (ACC Canada-Royaume-Uni)
* Accord de libre-échange Canada-Pérou (ALECP)
* Accord de libre-échange Canada-Colombie
* Accord de libre-échange Canada-Ukraine (ALECU)
* Accord de libre-échange Canada-Honduras
* Accord de
